text:
Nepal Ratna Girija Prasad Koirala (; 4 July 1924 – 20 March 2010), was a Nepalese politician. He was the Prime Minister of Nepal four times, including from 1991 to 1994, 1998 to 1999, 2000 to 2001, and from 2006 to 2008.
He was the Acting Head of State of Nepal between January 2007 and July 2008 as the country became a republic.

annotations.surface_form: Acting Head of State of Nepal
